title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: DELETE API Step
description: Definition of a DELETE API endpoint for removing a pet

title: Path Parameters
description: Using path parameters to capture the pet ID from the URL

title: Data Deletion
description: Remove a pet from the store using the provided ID

title: Conditional Response
description: Return different responses based on whether the deletion was successful

title: DELETE Operation
description: DELETE endpoints are the simplest - they just need to identify which resource to remove using path parameters. The handler returns either 204 No Content (success) or 404 Not Found (pet doesn't exist).

title: Handler
description: The handler function that executes when the DELETE request is made

title: HTTP Response
description: Returns appropriate HTTP status codes: 204 for successful deletion, 404 for not found
